subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Against the Heat, Manu Ginobili did all the odd and clever little things that have defined him for more than a decade, putting the Spurs one victory from their fifth N.B.A. championship.
snippet: Against the Heat, Manu Ginobili did all the odd and clever little things that have defined him for more than a decade, putting the Spurs one victory from their fifth N.B.A. championship.
